positions.subtitle: 91springboard
positions.description: -Responsible for community development and engagement at the hub level.-The ‘go-to-person’ in the startup hub for the all the coworkers. Also,strengthening the community by making active connections, organizing regular coworker meetups, etc.-Leading events to execution. Managing the local events calendar and ensuring a constant flow of events.-Representing 91springboard in various startup events (internal and external)Supporting and leading marketing for the startup hubs. Managing outreach channels (social media, mailing list, etc) to spread the word about all the 91springboard initiatives especially events-Introducing 91springboard coworking and other services to entrepreneurs who visit the hubs.-Building and maintaining relationships with entrepreneurial networks-Managing the hub accounting and facility management
positions.title: Sr. Community Manager
positions.description_html:
-Responsible for community development and engagement at the hub level.
-The ‘go-to-person’ in the startup hub for the all the coworkers. Also,strengthening the community by making active connections, organizing regular coworker meetups, etc.
-Leading events to execution. Managing the local events calendar and ensuring a constant flow of events.
-Representing 91springboard in various startup events (internal and external)
Supporting and leading marketing for the startup hubs. Managing outreach channels (social media, mailing list, etc) to spread the word about all the 91springboard initiatives especially events
-Introducing 91springboard coworking and other services to entrepreneurs who visit the hubs.
-Building and maintaining relationships with entrepreneurial networks
-Managing the hub accounting and facility management

experience.title: HR - Manager
experience.description: - Formulation of HR policies - Staffing and Recruitment- Performance Management - Personnel file Management - Compensation and Benefits- Joining formalities, Exit procedures, Exit Interviews, Retention
